## Data

This data was collected by Dr. Kristen Gorman at the Palmer Station, Antarctica LTER. It documents key ecological data (e.g. bill length, bill depth, flipper length) across three penguin species — Chinstrap, Gentoo, and Adelie — across three islands. It contains two data sets: penguins and penguins_raw.

![](https://allisonhorst.github.io/palmerpenguins/reference/figures/lter_penguins.png)
